General.Name: Firich Enterprises Co Ltd
General.Description: Firich Enterprises Co., Ltd. engages in the assembly, manufacture, import, and export of business-oriented computers and its peripheral equipment in Taiwan, China, rest of the Asia, Europe, and the United States. The company offers XPPC and mobile POS products; panel PCs; BOX systems; and kiosks, monitors, and peripherals. It also provides charity lottery and sports lottery vending machines; Touch screen POS terminal for the catering and retail industry, and supermarkets; and POS peripherals, such as customer displays, cash register keyboards and drawers, magnetic stripe readers, touch screen LCD displays, RFID/ fingerprint readers, and integrated POS solutions. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 75, Sin Tai Wu Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 221
